definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The travellers were dismayed to find the bridge had been wash away.
sentences.chinese: 旅行者們發現橋被衝跑了，很沮喪。

sentences.english: The bad weather detained the travellers for several hours.
sentences.chinese: 惡劣的天氣耽擱了旅行者幾個小時。

sentences.english: Comfy slip-on type shoes equals a happy traveler.
sentences.chinese: 寬鬆舒適的鞋子可以成就一個快樂的旅行者。

sentences.english: It is a must to take enough water for all travelers in deserts.
sentences.chinese: 帶足水對沙漠裏所有的旅行者來說都是必須的。

sentences.english: NASA's Voyager 1 spacecraft has reached the outside edge of the solar system.
sentences.chinese: NASA的旅行者1號已到達太陽系外緣。

sentences.english: A traveler drove a car to the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 一個旅行者駕駛着汽車去鄉村。

sentences.english: You don't haveto be a footloose young traveler to adopt this frugal mindset.
sentences.chinese: 你不必一定要做這種節儉行事的自由旅行者。

sentences.english: On Revenue avenue, the grave traveler jumped the gravestone bravely .
sentences.chinese: 在稿收大道上，嚴肅的旅行者勇敢地跳過墓碑。

sentences.english: The hot sun glared down on the travelers.
sentences.chinese: 烈日猛烈地照射在旅行者的頭上。

sentences.english: The problem of Jet Lag is one every international traveler comes across.
sentences.chinese: 時差反應是每一個國際旅行者可能遇到的問題。

sentences.english: Microsoft Corp. and Travelers Cos. were also dragging down the Dow.
sentences.chinese: 微軟公司和旅行者集團跌幅居前。

sentences.english: You are likely to meet many other travellers and locals alike.
sentences.chinese: 同樣的，你會在那兒遇到許多其他的旅行者和當地人。

sentences.english: The travellers were so tired that they flopped into bed and fell asleep at once.
sentences.chinese: 旅行者們太累了，一頭倒在牀上就進入了夢鄉。

sentences.english: The Wayfarer Rare Prints is a must have for any collector or enthusiast.
sentences.chinese: 該旅行者珍稀版畫是一個必須有任何收藏家或愛好者。

sentences.english: The country has become the dreamland for many tourists and adventure lovers.
sentences.chinese: 這個國度成爲了旅行者跟探險家夢牽魂回的地方。

sentences.english: The traveller thrilled us with his stories.
sentences.chinese: 這位旅行者的經歷使我們驚駭不已。

definition: to explore/to go on an expedition/adventure
